entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
